name: server
description: | Method | Endpoint                   | Description                         | | ------ | -------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | | GET    | `/auth/login`              | Initiate Microsoft login            | | GET    | `/auth/microsoft/callback` | Microsoft OAuth callback handler    | | GET    | `/auth/me`                 | Get current authenticated user info | | POST   | `/auth/logout`             | Logout current user                 |
